svg.text: Modern React Portfolio with Interactive Components & Serverless Backend
Frontend: React 18.3.1 • TypeScript 5.6.3 • Vite 6.0.0 • Tailwind CSS 3.4.17 • Framer Motion • Radix UI • Lucide React • React Hook Form • Wouter Router • react-zoom-pan-pinch
Backend & Infrastructure: Node.js • Vercel Serverless Functions • Resend Email API • GitHub API • Global CDN • Edge Computing
Development: ESBuild • PostCSS • Autoprefixer • Hot Module Replacement • TypeScript Compiler • Source Maps • Tree Shaking
